Read books: Reading is a great way to entertain yourself and expand your knowledge. Choose books on a variety of topics that interest you, from history to science to fiction. You can also listen to audiobooks if you prefer.
Practice mindfulness: Practice mindfulness techniques like meditation, yoga, or deep breathing to help you relax and focus. You can also try journaling to reflect on your thoughts and feelings.
Take up a new hobby: Try something new that you've always wanted to do, like painting, writing, or playing an instrument. This can be a great way to challenge yourself and keep yourself entertained.

Learn a new language: Learning a new language can be a fun and challenging way to keep yourself entertained. You can use language learning apps, watch language learning videos, or find a language exchange partner to practice with.
Play games: Play games that challenge your mind and problem-solving skills, like puzzles, chess, or Sudoku. You can also try video games or board games that you've never played before.
